name: eql-rule-001_1
description: Detects attempts to disable PowerShell Script Block Logging, which could be an attempt to evade detection mechanisms.
query: process where host.os.type == "windows" and event.type == "start" and (process.name : ("powershell.exe", "pwsh.exe") or process.pe.original_file_name == "PowerShell.EXE") and process.args : ("*Set-PSReadlineOption*", "*-HistorySaveStyle*", "*SaveNothing*")
author: Elastic
false_positives: Administrators may legitimately disable Script Block Logging for performance reasons in controlled environments.
